text: Georg Franz Danzer (7 October 1946 in Vienna â€“ 21 June 2007, in Asperhofen) was an Austrian musician. He wrote and sang many songs. Many people think of him as the father of Austropop. This is because he usually sang his songs in the local dialect. He died of lung cancer at age 60. title: Georg Danzer
